data.text: @TheImageAngelUK @KimKardashian @FlatTummyCo Good for you. Personally I don’t buy into all the other BS if I like something,I like it and if I want to try it,I try!
@iluvlar @KimKardashian @FlatTummyCo No, i help ladies love themselves just as they are and not buy in to what industries or media say they should look like

@TheImageAngelUK @KimKardashian @FlatTummyCo @tarynbrumfitt @bodyimagemvmt It’s great that there’s options out there for everyone and good for you and your business! Hope you do well!! Im trying the lollipops tho!
@TheImageAngelUK @KimKardashian @FlatTummyCo So in your business,you help people who don’t want to eat so much,deal with there hunger? Which supposedly is what their lollipops do.

@iluvlar @KimKardashian @FlatTummyCo No slapping here, just pointing out that it is an irresponsible product, potentially damaging. I will high five people like @tarynbrumfitt and the @bodyimagemvmt who I stand for and with. #Embrace #Embraceyouonline

@iluvlar @KimKardashian @FlatTummyCo yes there are hundreds. that is EXACTLY what the product is promoting. There are also other ways of dealing with hunger. Personal choice I know. My entire business IS based on working with women of all shapes and sizes. Shame these companies don't do the same
@TheImageAngelUK @KimKardashian @FlatTummyCo How about giving more high fives than slaps to the face when people don’t think the way you do! We all have our issues just trying to get through life.

@TheImageAngelUK @KimKardashian @FlatTummyCo There are hundreds of appetite suppressants already out there. No one is saying thin=happy  I might just want something to help me not be so hungry all the time. There are beautiful women of all sizes out there who are extremely happy!

@iluvlar @KimKardashian @FlatTummyCo The point @iluvlar is that it is NOT funny and is a completely irresponsible product. Hugely bad example to set young girls especially, and just cashing in on telling people that thin = happy.
